trans-unit.source: A helper class that provides information about the browser environment in which a XAML browser application (XBAP) application is hosted.
trans-unit.target: 提供瀏覽器環境相關資訊的協助程式類別，XAML 瀏覽器應用程式 (XBAP) 裝載於該環境中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to an object that can be used to access the host browser via its OLE container interfaces (for example, IOleClientSite::GetContainer();).
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的參考，該物件可用於透過主瀏覽器的 OLE 容器介面 (例如，IOleClientSite::GetContainer();) 存取該瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be cast to <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.OLE.Interop.IOleClientSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以轉換成 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.OLE.Interop.IOleClientSite" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: to get this object.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得此物件。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame.
trans-unit.target: 如果是在框架中裝載 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]，則取得指令碼物件，以便提供對 HTML 視窗物件、自訂函式和 HTML 網頁全域變數的存取權。

trans-unit.source: A script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在框架中裝載 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]，則為提供對 HTML 視窗物件、自訂函式和 HTML 網頁全域變數之存取的指令碼物件，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: With the returned <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A> object, you can access the properties, methods, and events of the HTML window object, call a script function directly, or access a global variable.
trans-unit.target: 使用所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A>物件，您可以存取屬性、 方法和 HTML 的視窗物件的事件、 指令碼函式直接呼叫，或存取全域變數。

trans-unit.source: The syntax to access these items uses the familiar dot notation.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取這些項目語法會使用熟悉的點標記法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the window object, see [window object](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160274) in the Dynamic HTML (DHTML) documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關視窗物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[視窗物件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160274)動態 HTML (DHTML) 文件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A> property returns `null` if the frame is navigated to from a cross-domain location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A>屬性會傳回`null`如果框架導覽至從跨網域位置。

trans-unit.source: This feature can be turned off for Internet Explorer by setting the **ScriptInteropDisallow** registry value.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能可以關閉 Internet explorer 藉由設定**ScriptInteropDisallow**登錄值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A> object and close the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取<xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A>物件，並關閉瀏覽器視窗。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application is browser hosted.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指定目前的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 應用程式是否由瀏覽器裝載。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application is browser hosted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式由瀏覽器所裝載則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> can be host agnostic and, consequently, can be loaded into several different types of hosts, including a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, or a browser.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>可以是主機無從驗證，因此，可以先載入到數種不同的主機，包括<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>、 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>，或瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: This can happen when you have a library assembly that contains one or more pages, and which is referenced by multiple standalone and browsable ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]) host applications.
trans-unit.target: 這種情形時有程式庫組件，其中包含一個或多個頁面，而是由多個獨立的參考和可瀏覽 ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]) 裝載應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.IsBrowserHosted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to determine if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> is hosted in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.IsBrowserHosted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>判斷<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>裝載在瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the location from which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] application was launched.
trans-unit.target: 取得位置的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] 應用程式就是從該位置啟動的。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> for the location from which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] application was launched; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 位置的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] 應用程式就是從該位置啟動的，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.Source%2A> property contains only a <xref:System.Uri> for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.Source%2A>屬性僅包含<xref:System.Uri>如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]應用程式。

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.Source%2A> property, see <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.IsBrowserHosted%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.Source%2A>屬性，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.IsBrowserHosted%2A>。
